modName: More plants and recipes for Hearthfire including Dawnguard and Dragonborn plants
summary: Adds a number of new plantables to the Hearthfire planters, currently: Jarrin Root, Nirnroot, Crimson Nirnroot, Frost Mirriam, Elves Ear, Blueberry, Garlic, Red Apple Tree, Green Apple Tree, Tomatoes, Saltrice, Sugar and Stoneflower. Dawnguard version adds  Gleamblossom, Yellow Mountain Flower and Soul Husk.
descriptionHtml:
Depending on version adds the following plants to Hearthfire planters including in the garden: 

Base game plants: 
Nirnroot 
Crimson Nirnroot 
Frost Mirriam 
Elves Ear 

Dragonborn plants: 
Trama Root 
Spiky Grass Ash 
Scathecraw 
Ash Yam 
Ash Creep Cluster 

Dawnguard plants: 
Yellow Mountain Flower 
Soul Husk 
Gleam Blossom 

New Meshes: 
Jarrin Root 
Tomato 
Red Apple 
Green Apple 
Garlic 
MoonSugar 

Nests: 
Chaurus Eggs 
Pine Thrush\'s Egg 
Hawk\'s Egg 
Chicken\'s Egg 
Rock Warbler\'s Egg 

The versions with extras also add:
Blueberries
Sugar
Saltrice
Stoneflower
A new food (Blueberry Crostata) and recipes for  Blueberry Crostata, Long Taffy Treat, Boiled Creme Treat, Honey Nut Treat, Moon Sugar, Butter and Spiced Wine.

Adds 3 of each of the available plantables to the main crafting chests outside Hearthfire houses.

Potential conflicts with anything editing the house planters or adding any of the plants I\'ve adding. This mod is cleaned regularly when uploading.

All mods require Hearthfire, different versions available depending on if you have Dawnguard and/or Dragonborn.

To do: add more plants
Add the ability to craft or buy planters
Work out how to make Poison Bloom work (currently being problematic)
author: Rowan Thomas - Numberland

files.name: More plants dawnguard
files.changelogHtml:
Mesh improvements
Correcting so plants that were producing the wrong thing.

files.name: More plants Hearthfire only
files.changelogHtml:
Mesh improvements
Correcting so plants that were producing the wrong thing.

files.name: More plants all DLCs with extras
files.fileName: More plants all DLCs with extras-26851-3-0.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Adds Dragonborn plants (Trama Root, Spiky Grass Ash, Scathecraw, Ash Yam & Ash Creep Cluster), Moon sugar & nests.
Reduces the potency of blueberries
Makes some recipes available in general cook pots
Changed sugar to not use an unique (and therefore useless) alchemy property.
